SQL_MODE.SQL: SELECT BRH_ID,BRH_ID||'-'||BRH_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_BRH_INFO order by BRH_ID
SELECT ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_ROLE_INF order by ROLE_ID
SELECT BRH_ID,BRH_ID||'-'||BRH_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_BRH_INFO where brh_level <> '2' order by BRH_ID
select MCHT_CITY_CODE,MCHT_CITY_CODE||' - '||CITY_NAME as name from CST_CITY_CODE
SELECT FUNC_ID ,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF where FUNC_TYPE = '1' order by FUNC_ID
SELECT CRT_OPR_ID,CRT_OPR_ID ||' - '||(select opr_name from tbl_opr_info b where b.opr_id = a.CRT_OPR_ID ) as DESCR FROM TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF_TMP_TMP a
SELECT MCHNT_TP_GRP,MCHNT_TP_GRP ||' - '||DESCR as DESCR FROM TBL_INF_MCHNT_TP_GRP
SELECT MCHNT_TP_GRP,MCHNT_TP_GRP ||' - '||substr(DESCR,0,4) as DESCR FROM TBL_INF_MCHNT_TP_GRP
SELECT trim(group_mcht_cd) as id,trim(group_mcht_cd)||' - '||trim(group_name) as name FROM tbl_group_mcht_inf ORDER BY group_mcht_cd
SELECT CUP_CITY_CODE,CUP_CITY_CODE ||' - '|| CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME FROM TBL_CITY_CODE
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHNT_ATTR'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CERTIFICATE'
select term_tp,descr from tbl_term_tp
select TXN_NUM,TXN_NAME from TBL_TXN_NAME order by TXN_NUM
select dest_rsp_code,rsp_code_dsp from tbl_rsp_code_map where dest_rsp_code <> '00' order by dest_rsp_code
select mchnt_tp,mchnt_tp ||' - '||descr from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp
select mchnt_tp,mchnt_tp||' - '||substr(descr,6) from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp
select app_id,app_id from tbl_term_management_app_main where stat ='1'
select app_id,app_id from tbl_term_management_app_main where stat ='1'
select TXN_NUM,TXN_NAME from TBL_TXN_NAME where DC_FLAG = '1' order by TXN_NUM
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHT_E_CD' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT FUNC_ID,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF WHERE FUNC_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY FUNC_ID
select distinct trim(INS_ID_CD) as id,trim(INS_ID_CD)||' - '||trim(CARD_DIS) from TBL_BANK_BIN_INF order by id
select distinct PAPER_ID,PAPER_ID as PAPER from TBL_PAPER_HIS_INF
select INT_TXN_CODE,INT_TXN_CODE||'-'||DSP from TBL_TERM_TXN where mod(INT_TXN_CODE,2)=1 order by INT_TXN_CODE
select opr_id,opr_id||'-'||opr_name from tbl_opr_info order by opr_id
select disc_cd, disc_cd || '-' || disc_nm from tbl_inf_disc_cd
SELECT distinct t1.MCHT_NO,t1.MCHT_NO||'-'||t2.MCHT_NM FROM TBL_HOLD_MCHT_PARTICIPAT t1 left join TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF t2 on t1.MCHT_NO=t2.MCHT_NO ORDER BY t1.MCHT_NO
SELECT distinct ACT_NO,trim(ACT_NO)||' - '||trim(ACT_NAME) FROM TBL_HOLDER_ACT ORDER BY ACT_NO
SELECT distinct ACT_NO,trim(ACT_NO)||' - '||trim(ACT_NAME) FROM TBL_HOLDER_ACT where act_content='3' ORDER BY ACT_NO
SELECT ACT_NO,trim(ACT_NO)||' - '||trim(ACT_NAME) FROM TBL_HOLDER_ACT where act_content in ('3','2') ORDER BY ACT_NO
SELECT trim(card_id)as cardId,(trim(card_id)||' - '||trim(card_name))as cardName FROM tbl_card_route ORDER BY card_id
select distinct manufaturer,manufaturer from tbl_term_management
select distinct terminal_type,terminal_type from tbl_term_management
select first_mcht_cd,first_mcht_cd||' - '||first_mcht_nm as first_mcht_nm from tbl_first_mcht_inf
select mcht_no,mcht_no||' - '||mcht_nm from tbl_mcht_base_inf
select distinct(t.COM_CODE),t.COM_CODE from tbl_snd_pack t order by t.COM_CODE
select trim(RULE_CODE),trim(RULE_CODE)||' - '||MSC1 from TBL_RULE_MCHT_REL order by RULE_CODE
select trim(FIRST_MCHT_CD),trim(FIRST_MCHT_CD)||' - '||trim(FIRST_MCHT_NM) from TBL_FIRST_MCHT_INF order by FIRST_MCHT_CD
select trim(mcht_id_up),trim(mcht_id_up)||' - '||trim(mcht_name_up) from Tbl_Upbrh_Mcht order by mcht_id_up
SELECT DISTINCT trim(RISK_LVL), trim(RISK_LVL)||' - '||trim(RESVED) FROM TBL_RISK_LVL where risk_lvl != '4' and trim(RESVED) is not NULL
select DEST_ID,DEST_ID||' - '||FIRST_BRH_NAME from TBL_FIRST_BRH_DEST_ID order by DEST_ID
select distinct(a.dest_id), a.dest_id || '-' || b.name from tbl_route_upbrh2 a inner join tbl_route_upbrh b on a.brh_id2 = b.brh_id
select FIRST_BRH_ID,FIRST_BRH_ID||' - '||FIRST_BRH_NAME from TBL_FIRST_BRH_DEST_ID order by FIRST_BRH_ID
select CHANNEL_ID,CHANNEL_ID||' - '||CHANNEL_NAME from TBL_PAY_CHANNEL_INFO order by CHANNEL_ID

select CHANNEL_ID as a1,CHANNEL_ID||' - '||CHANNEL_NAME from TBL_PAY_CHANNEL_INFO where CHANNEL_ID!='1510' union select '1510' as a1,'1510 - 中信银行(旧)' from dual union select '1500' as a1,'1500 - 中信网银(新)' from dual order by a1

select CHANNEL_ID as a1,CHANNEL_ID||' - '||CHANNEL_NAME from TBL_PAY_CHANNEL_INFO where CHANNEL_ID!='1510' and CHANNEL_ID in(select CHANNEL_ID from TBL_PAY_CHANNEL_INFO where CHANNEL_FLAG ='1') union select '1510' as a1,'1510 - 中信银行(旧)' from dual union select '1500' as a1,'1500 - 中信网银(新)' from dual order by a1
SELECT CHANNEL_ID,CHANNEL_ID||' - '||CHANNEL_NAME FROM TBL_PAY_CHANNEL_INFO WHERE CHANNEL_STA = '1'
SELECT SA_MODEL_KIND AS VAL,SA_MODEL_KIND AS DSP FROM TBL_RISK_INF ORDER BY SA_MODEL_KIND
SELECT DISC_ID,DISC_ID||'-'||DISC_NAME as DISC_ID_NAME FROM TBL_BRH_FEE_CTL order by DISC_ID
select DEST_ID,DEST_ID||' - '||FIRST_BRH_NAME from TBL_FIRST_BRH_DEST_ID order by DEST_ID
